Email: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Email (_id VARCHAR,_from VARCHAR,sender_mail VARCHAR,date VARCHAR,email_date VARCHAR,subject VARCHAR,unread VARCHAR,uid VARCHAR,is_automatic_email_send VARCHAR,default_tag VARCHAR,is_attachment VARCHAR)
Customer_Table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Customer_Table(IDLocal INTEGER,IDWeb INTEGER,FirstName CHAR,LastName CHAR,EmailAddress CHAR,Password CHAR,CustomerAccountIDLocal CHAR,JobIDForce CHAR,LastUpdatedDateTime CHAR,LoginBarcode CHAR)
